ygData.subject: New Guild Forming on the Starpyre Server
ygData.msgSnippet: I created an Ikky Monk last week on the Starpyre server.  I soloed him form lvl 1 to lvl 10 which took me about a total of 24 hours (most of that time I was
ygData.messageBody:
I created an Ikky Monk last week on the Starpyre server. I soloed him form
lvl 1 to lvl 10 which took me about a total of 24 hours (most of that time I
was working on my curscale armor). Form there I went form lvl 10 to lvl 16
in Kurn's Tower that took me about 6 hours game time in group. Then from
lvl 16 to 22 which I accomplished in roughly 3 hours in Paludal Caverns
bouncing back and forth between B1 and B2.

In all that I am also helping form a new guild on the Starpyre and once we
get approved by SOE we will be called Raiders of the Twilight. We already
have a guild message board and a guild website. And we are recruiting
right now. if anyone is interested send me an email.

Ayeareleezaard 22 Ikky Monk
Second in Command
Raiders of the Twilight


---
